name: Bacon, Mushroom, and Oyster Stuffing
author: rhondarella
summary: I could never find the right oyster stuffing recipe, so I made my own with bacon, onion, mushrooms, and oysters. It is great with grilled turkey.
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) jar oysters, drained and cut into thirds
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Place bacon in a large, deep skillet; cook over medium-high heat until evenly brown
Remove bacon to a paper towel-lined plate to drain
Add the butter to the bacon drippings and melt over medium-high heat
Cook the onion, garlic, and mushrooms in the butter and drippings until the onion has caramelized, 10 to 15 minutes
Pour the wine into the skillet; allow the wine to warm; remove from heat
Place the stuffing cubes in a large bowl
Pour the vegetable mixture over the cubes
Fold the oysters into the mixture
Transfer the stuffing to a 9x13 inch baking dish
Bake in preheated oven until golden brown on top, about 30 minutes
